div.p: This code system https://kip.rkkp.dk/fhir/CodeSystem/NIHSS10Dysarthria defines the following codes:

tr.td: Mild-to-moderate dysarthria; patient slurs at least some words and, at worst, can be understood with some difficulty.
Severe dysarthria; patient's speech is so slurred as to be unintelligible in the absence of or out of proportion to any dysphasia, or is mute/anarthric.
Intubated or other physical barrier, explain:
